template = """<%namespace name="foo" file="somefile.html"/> ## inherit from foobar.html <%inherit file="foobar.html"/> <%def name="header()">
header
<%def name="footer()">
footer
% for j in data(): % for x in j: % endfor % endfor
Hello ${x| h}
""" nodes = Lexer(template).parse() self._compare(nodes, TemplateNode({}, [NamespaceTag('namespace', {'file': 'somefile.html', 'name': 'foo'}, (1, 1), []), Text('\n', (1, 46)), Comment('inherit from foobar.html', (2, 1)), InheritTag('inherit', { 'file': 'foobar.html'}, (3, 1), []), Text('\n\n', (3, 31)), DefTag( 'def', {'name': 'header()'}, (5, 1), [Text( """
header
""", (5, 23))]), Text('\n', (7, 8)), DefTag( 'def', {'name': 'footer()'}, (8, 1), [Text( """
footer
""", (8, 23))]), Text('\n\n\n', (10, 8)), ControlLine('for', 'for j in data():', False, (13, 1)), Text( ' \n', (14, 1)), ControlLine('for', 'for x in j:', False, (15, 1 )), Text(' \n', (16, 30)), ControlLine('for', 'endfor', True, (17, 1)), Text(' \n', (18, 1)), ControlLine('for', 'endfor', True, ( 19, 1)), Text('
Hello ', (16, 1)), Expression('x', ['h'], (16, 23)), Text('
\n', (20, 1))]))
